commands.viewpoints¶

Classes¶

ViewPoints

This class retrieves and displays tasks filtered by their completion progress, formatted for Slack.

Module Contents¶

class commands.viewpoints.ViewPoints(progress: float = 0.0)[source]¶

This class retrieves and displays tasks filtered by their completion progress, formatted for Slack.

Why: Useful for users who want to view tasks based on their completion status, providing a clear view of tasks in progress or those that are completed.

How: Common usage examples: 1. ViewPoints(progress=0.0).get_list(): Retrieve a list of tasks that are incomplete. 2. ViewPoints(progress=1.0).get_list(): Retrieve a list of tasks that are completed.

base_point_block_format[source]¶
progress[source]¶
payload[source]¶
get_list()[source]¶

Retrieves tasks with the specified progress status, formatted for Slack.

Returns:

Slack message payload containing tasks with the specified progress status.

Return type:

dict

Why: Provides users with a filtered list of tasks, either completed or in progress, helping them stay organized and track their workload effectively. How: Example usage - ` task_list = view_points.get_list() `

Slackpoints
